name: RobotRavers(ControllingourBody)
0:
”Alexa, open Robot Ravers”
”Alexa, start Robot Ravers”
”Alexa, launch Robot Ravers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robot ravers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Our robot’s radio is broken and just stops! Kids (and adults) must use their listening skills and self-control muscles to stop when the radio stops.

Why it’s educational: This experience is designed to help kids not only practice listening skills but also demonstrate self-control (i.e., executive function skills) in a fun, engaging way!

Music by: Bensound

For more screen-less, play-based learning experiences, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill . By combining voice technology and real-world, tangible play, we help educators and families learn together in a safe, natural, and engaging way - without screens!

If you found the skill helpful, we greatly appreciate reviews!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
